attributes.additional_details:
Closing the pools in the Bradford area is detrimental to a child's need to learn how to swim, closing the pools will mean travelling a great distance that parents wont be able to afford, Slowly and surely our amenities are being taken away from us and our children, we will not stand for it and the whole of Bradford will do all they can to see that the pools in the area stay open, please see links,
 http://www.bradford.gov.uk/bmdc/leisure_and_culture/sports_and_leisure/sports_facilities/richard_dunn_sports_centre
Bowling swimming pool details http://www.bradford.gov.uk/bmdc/leisure_and_culture/sports_and_leisure/sports_facilities/bowling_pool
Queensbury Bath details = http://www.bradford.gov.uk/bmdc/leisure_and_culture/sports_and_leisure/sports_facilities/queensbury_pool
And last but, not least Bingley baths details = http://www.bradford.gov.uk/bmdc/leisure_and_culture/sports_and_leisure/sports_facilities/bingley_pool

rejection.details: For the Local Council to decide upon.
